description:
With Goku badly injured, Vegeta steps in to face Frieza. Stronger than ever, Vegeta proves to be a challenge and an enraged Frieza destroys the planet! Protected by Whis, the Z fighters are given a chance to save Earth, if they act fast enough.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikyuu Bakuhatsu!? Kecchaku no Kamehame Ha
Die Erde explodiert! – Die entscheidende Kamehameha!
The Earth Explodes?! The Deciding Kamehameha
地球爆発!? 決着のかめはめ波
